ProductDescription.LongDesc: My Personal HD Studio Creative HD editing with Quad Core processor, Blu-ray Disc Writer and Full HD VAIO Display Premium. - HD+ VAIO Display brings your entertainment vividly to life. - Transfer data 5x faster with SuperSpeed USB3.0 (the logical transfer speed of up to 2.5Gbps). - Super smooth HD on the go with Motion Reality HD. - Enjoy music and movies in cinema-style surround sound with Dolby Home Theater v3.
